title: MC_GroupReadActualVelocity (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_GroupReadActualVelocity
This function block returns the current velocity of an axis group
in the selected coordinate system.
This is an administrative FB, since no movement is generated.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Get the velocity of the axis group
in the selected coordinate system while enabled

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block

Current velocity of the group.  If a cartesian coordinate system is
selected,Velocity.ccontains the cartesian velocity:
(X,Y,Z) is the velocity vector in u/s, (A,B,C) is the angular velocity
around the x, y, z axis in Â°/s.
Current velocities of the groupâs additional axes.
